post.author: 이계영
post.content:
Hi,
Those are some questions when I took the certification exam.
How does Admin Server talk to managed servers
Web Service sequences
DataSource configuration
JSP forward
JSP exception
WSDL, UDDI, JAX RPC, SOAP
HttpSession
3 implicit object in servlet
How to get UserTransaction
What are the admin server's role
How does replica os delivered to managed server.
What does -Dweblogic.management.server=https://host:adminport
Autodeploy affects server/cluster/domain
What does EJBGen do
What are the ways to get sequence
Deployable service/components
Characteristic of forward
Transaction model in EJB
What does config.xml do.
You can reference the site for more questions at http://www.getgamma.com/wlscert.html
post.title: BEA Weblogic 7.0 Certification questions
